title: Silver 4 looking for support main for easy wins

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body: as titlte says im s4 looking for a support main, if ur not a good support dont add me and skype/cs/any voice communication type is a must.

replies.body:
Hey man I am a currently a silv 5 main support and have curse and skype if you are keen I am totally up for a good adc to make me feel
like my efforts aren't in vane.
My IGN: Twisted kiwi, im a quality support ;) im always looking for a good adc to solo q with happy to play a few with ya and try it out i have skype also.
